newsitem.headline: Update 11.3 in the making
newsitem.text: Scheduled for a release in Mid June, Update 11.3 brings a new and improved gui for the launcher settings, several improvements to the EHS, Integrated Search, Improved features and new improvements to your workspace. Watch Sapphire's Google Plus Community Group for sneak peaks and previews. Let's build something together.

newsitem.headline: Game with the dev
newsitem.text: HMU up on the Sony Playstation 4 this weekend and Play some Destiny with me! PSN Dracos_Aura

newsitem.headline: Gocal Software Development scheduled maintenance
newsitem.text: GSD is and will be under going maintenance later this week. The website may be slow while under maintenance and weird glitches and activity may be noticed.

newsitem.headline: A Special Thanks
newsitem.text: You've raised over 300 dollars in donations for the month of may in Sapphire UI keys. That is outstanding! Lets make the goal 400 for the month of june. Donations go towards purchasing a new android device that will be supported the next 4 years and new software & equipment for development. We can't have a finished project built with crusty equipment named after my grandfather...Remember to update your experience on Google Play for Sapphire.

newsitem.headline: Spaces!
newsitem.text: Join us on Spaces! Exclusive first looks, in-group discussion and more. HMU on hangouts for details.

newsitem.headline: Ratings and Reviews
newsitem.text: Don't forget to update your reviews on google play and xda labs! If you haven't had the moment to rate Sapphire UI, take the time todo so. Ratings are part of the community focus and user feedback program and updates usually are forged and based on feedback. Let us build something together.

newsitem.headline: SUI Backers
newsitem.text: Grab an Onyx License to show off true backing support. Adds Onyx Subscriber to Sapphire launcher settings subtitle.

newsitem.headline: Update 11.2
newsitem.text: Welcome to Sapphire UI Milestone 2! This update was forged on the innovation of the XDA and Google Plus Community Groups

newsitem.headline: SUI Google Plus
newsitem.text: Join the Google Plus Group to get in on exclusive sneak peaks, dev previews, and one on one dev support!

newsitem.headline: SUI Papers
newsitem.text: Wallpapers will be updated on a monthly basis based on top picks of the android communities.

newsitem.headline: Welcome and Thankyou for your support!
newsitem.text: Enjoy your stay, Ask questions, get involved with the communities and stay active! Sapphire UI is the community custom launcher powered by google exclusively for Android 5.0+
